metadata.title: CVE-2023-45362 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in DifferenceEngine.php in MediaWiki before1.35.12, 1.36.x through 1.39.x before 1.39.5, and 1.40.x before 1.40.1.diff-multi-sameuser (aka "X intermediate revisions by the same user notshown") ignores username suppression. This is an information leak.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
